verses.verse: Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is good; <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Oh <S%H4994><s%> let Israel <S%H3478><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>"
Oh <S%H4994><s%> let the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>"
Oh <S%H4994><s%> let those who fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>"
From [my] distress <S%H4712><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> upon the Lord; <S%H3050><s%> The Lord <S%H3050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me [and set me] in a large <S%H4800><s%> place. <S%H4800><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is for me; I will not fear; <S%H3372><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> can man <S%H120><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me?
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is for me among those who help <S%H5826><s%> me; Therefore I shall look <S%H7200><s%> [with satisfaction] on those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Than <S%H4480><s%> to trust <S%H982><s%> in man. <S%H120><s%>
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Than <S%H4480><s%> to trust <S%H982><s%> in princes. <S%H5081><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me; In the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> I will surely <S%H3588><s%> cut <S%H4135><s%> them off. <S%H4135><s%>

They surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me, yes, <S%H1571><s%> they surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me; In the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> I will surely <S%H3588><s%> cut <S%H4135><s%> them off. <S%H4135><s%>

They surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me like bees; <S%H1682><s%> They were extinguished <S%H1846><s%> as a fire <S%H784><s%> of thorns; <S%H6975><s%> In the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> I will surely <S%H3588><s%> cut <S%H4135><s%> them off. <S%H4135><s%>
You pushed <S%H1760><s%> me violently <S%H1760><s%> so that I was falling, <S%H5307><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> helped <S%H5826><s%> me.
The Lord <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song, <S%H2172><s%> And He has become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

The sound <S%H6963><s%> of joyful <S%H7440><s%> shouting <S%H7440><s%> and salvation <S%H3444><s%> is in the tents <S%H168><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> The right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> valiantly. <S%H2428><s%>

The right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is exalted; <S%H7311><s%> The right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> valiantly. <S%H2428><s%>
I shall not die, <S%H4191><s%> but live, <S%H2421><s%> And tell <S%H5608><s%> of the works <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3050><s%>
The Lord <S%H3050><s%> has disciplined <S%H3256><s%> me severely, <S%H3256><s%> But He has not given <S%H5414><s%> me over to death. <S%H4194><s%>
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the gates <S%H8179><s%> of righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> I shall enter <S%H935><s%> through them, I shall give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3050><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will enter <S%H935><s%> through it.
I shall give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, for Thou hast answered <S%H6030><s%> me; And Thou hast become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
The stone <S%H68><s%> which the builders <S%H1129><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> Has become <S%H1961><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> corner <S%H6438><s%> [stone.]
This <S%H384><s%> is the Lord's doing <S%H4480><s%>; <S%H854><s%> It is marvelous <S%H6381><s%> in our eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has made; <S%H6213><s%> Let us rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in it.

O <S%H577><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> do save, <S%H3467><s%> we beseech <S%H577><s%> Thee; O <S%H577><s%> Lord, <S%H3068><s%> we beseech <S%H577><s%> Thee, do send <S%H6743><s%> prosperity! <S%H6743><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> is the one who comes <S%H935><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> We have blessed <S%H1288><s%> you from the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is God, <S%H410><s%> and He has given <S%H215><s%> us light; <S%H215><s%> Bind <S%H631><s%> the festival <S%H2282><s%> sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> with cords <S%H5688><s%> to the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
Thou art my God, <S%H410><s%> and I give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee; [Thou art] my God, <S%H430><s%> I extol <S%H7311><s%> Thee.
Give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is good; <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
